articles.author: Nimesh Vora
articles.title: Rupee to rally on growing bets Fed to cut rates next year - Reuters
articles.description: The Indian rupee is expected to rally at open on Wednesday after a softer-than-expected U.S. inflation print increased the odds of the Federal Reserve pivoting to rate cuts around the middle of next year.
articles.content: MUMBAI, Nov 15 (Reuters) - The Indian rupee is expected to rally at open on Wednesday after a softer-than-expected U.S. inflation print increased the odds of the Federal Reserve pivoting to rate cuts… [+2064 chars]

articles.title: Mahindra Scorpio-N based Global Pik Up spotted testing - Team-BHP
articles.description: Mahindra showcased a rugged and sporty pickup truck concept called the 'Global Pik Up' earlier this year. Now for the first time, spy images of what appears to be a pre-production test mule have surfaced online.

articles.description: Analysts at S&P Global Ratings upgrade rating for Tata Motors and its wholly-owned subsidiaries on hopes of strong operating cash flow and develeveraging prospects
